info.description: This is the Care-Cordination server API documentation.
info.title: Care-Cordination API

post.description: Authenticate user and return access and refresh tokens
Logout user by invalidating the refresh token
Refresh access and refresh tokens using a valid refresh token

get.description: List all clients currently in care with pagination and search. Returns weeks in accommodation for living care types or used ambulatory hours for ambulatory care.

parameters.description: Search by client first name or last name
parameters.name: search

post.description: Move a client from intake form to waiting list by creating a client record

get.description: List all clients on the waiting list with pagination and search

parameters.description: Search by client first name or last name
parameters.name: search

post.description: Move a client from waiting list to in care status

parameters.description: Care start date and optional ambulatory hours
parameters.name: request

get.description: List all employees with pagination and search

parameters.description: Search by first name, last name, or full name
parameters.name: search

get.description: List all incidents with pagination and search by client name

parameters.description: Search by client first name, last name, or full name
parameters.name: search

parameters.description: Search by client first name or last name
parameters.name: search

get.description: List all location transfers with pagination and search

post.description: Register a new location transfer for a client

get.description: List all locations with pagination and search

parameters.description: Search by name, postal code, or address
parameters.name: search

get.description: Get a paginated list of referring organizations with optional search

parameters.description: Search term for name, contact person, or email
parameters.name: search

post.description: Create a new referring organization with the provided details

parameters.description: Filter by status (pending, approved, rejected, in_review)
parameters.name: status

transferDate.description: or time.Time, but for JSON, string

Bearer.description: Add 'Bearer ' prefix before your JWT token for authentication
Bearer.name: Authorization
